trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged" /> 또는 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged" /> 이벤트가 발생할 경우 콜백 메서드에 인증된 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 피어의 현재 상태에 대한 변경 형식을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> object containing data that specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 피어의 현재 상태에 대한 변경 형식을 지정하는 데이터가 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> on which the presence information has changed.

<see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태 정보가 변경된 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />와 연결되어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> specified by <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> is not associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, this value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> 에 지정 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> 연관 되지 않은는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>,이 값은 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.
<see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.

Specifies the changed presence information of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> as well as a string provided by <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트된 현재 상태를 설명하는 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />에서 제공하는 문자열 및 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" />에 대한 변경된 현재 상태 정보를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Changed presence information for <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> and a string describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />에 대한 변경된 현재 상태 정보 및 업데이트된 현재 상태를 설명하는 문자열입니다.
